record.field: ${object.partner_id and object.partner_id.email and object.partner_id.id or False }

field.name: body_html
field.div: % set partner = object.partner_id % set sponsorships = object.get_objects() % set children = sponsorships.mapped('child_id') % set preferred_name = children.get_list('firstname', 3, 'many children')
field.p:
${object.partner_id.salutation}
First of all, we want to thank you warmly for your precious commitment towards ${preferred_name}. Through your support you are giving ${children.get('him')} hope and a future!
Attached to this letter you will find the following documents:
% if partner.payment_mode_id.id == 10:
- Payment slips for the payment of your sponsorship for 2018 including the payment slips for the gifts (birthday gift, general gift and family gift)
% endif % if partner.payment_mode_id.id != 10:
- Payment slips for making gifts to your sponsored child (birthday gift, general gift and family gift)
% endif % if partner != sponsorships.correspondent_id and partner.payment_mode_id.id == 10:
- Payment slips for the payment of your sponsorship for 2018
% endif
Gifts to ${children.get('your sponsored child')} are optional. Please do not feel obligated to make one. Your sponsorship is already a wonderful gift and we are very thankful for that!
Should you lose your payment slips or if you wish to have more, please contact us and we will be happy to send them to you. We are also available for further questions. You can find our contact details at the bottom of this page.
We wish you a Merry Christmas and a happy New Year!
Yours sincerely,
